name: Red Chain Leggings
data: It increases the users strength impressively.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It decreases the users wisdom adequately.
It has awesome armour class for its type (poor in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
Red Chain leggings are an artifact of the goddess Kirvana.
Red Chain leggings can sometimes prevent relocations when 'activate'ed.
Red Chain leggings can be 'deactivate'd to allow relocations.
